title: Man United secret: Stormzy makes revelation about Paul Pogba
text: Man United secret: Stormzy makes revelation about Paul Pogba MANCHESTER UNITED's world-record signing of Paul Pogba had to be kept secret by Stormzy. By Jack Staplehurst PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 05:15, Fri, Mar 3, 2017 The grime artist was given the responsibility of knowing about the France international's Â£89million switch last summer from Juventus. United were heavily linked with a move for their former midfielder in the build-up to the summer transfer window. And Jose Mourinho saw a swoop for Paul Pogba sanctioned by the United hierarchy. GETTY Paul Pogba has won two pieces of silverware already since returning to Manchester United The announcement was made of his return in conjunction with Adidas with a promotional video involving Pogba and Croydon-born Red Devils fan Stormzy. United confirmed the signing on August 9 , but Pogba's comeback was really completed far sooner. When asked if his Adidas music video with Pogba was made the afternoon before he signed, Stormzy revealed preparations were undergone much earlier, forcing him to stay quiet.
